body:

I am looking at this now.

Feels weird pinging a thread that's being looked at, but per build-pony procedure here's another ping:
https://grpc-testing.appspot.com/job/gRPC_master/config=asan,language=c++,platform=linux/7913/testReport/(root)/tests/bins_asan_end2end_test/
#3595 and #3627 fixed the first and second issues. The leak should be fixed by #3679. There are other flakes which I filed separately in #3680 and #3681. I think this can be closed.

failure still happening on v1.1.x.

saw in https://grpc-testing.appspot.com/job/gRPC_pull_requests_linux/2614/testReport/junit/(root)/c++_linux_opt/bins_opt_end2end_test___gtest_filter_End2end_End2endTest_ChannelState_1__GRPC_POLL_STRATEGY_poll/

pr #9654 against v1.1.x
